support.

Hi! I'm not sure if you can help me, but I wanted to know if there are any ongoing sales or discounts on your online store. I'm looking to buy some new hiking gear. Thanks!

Hello there! Absolutely, I can help you with that. We always have exciting offers running on our online store!

Right now, we have a **"Spring into Adventure"** sale on select hiking boots and backpacks, with discounts up to 20% off. Additionally, all orders over $75 receive free shipping.

If you're interested in becoming a member of our **Summit Club**, that's a great way to save money year-round. It costs $25 per year and gives you 10% off most purchases, plus other perks like free gear rentals twice a year!

Do you have any specific types of hiking gear in mind? I can tell you if they are part of any current promotions!
Perfect! Thanks for the info. I'm particularly interested in waterproof jackets. Are any of those on sale right now?
